title: Fortnite
short_plot_summary: Players drop onto an island, build structures, gather resources, and battle each other to be the last person or team standing.
explanation: A bus, representing the Battle Bus where players start and drop onto the island
A map, symbolizing the game map where players explore and battle
A crane, illustrating the building aspect of the game
A running person, representing the action-packed gameplay of Fortnite
A pistol, signifying the combat and battle theme of the game
